summary: because-im-hap-hap replied to your post  “okay so now the question is How Pissed Will The Bright Queen Be? and...” Im very very...
body:
because-im-hap-hap replied to your post “okay so now the question is How Pissed Will The Bright Queen Be? and…”
Im very very very scared of how mad she could be, but they were trying to stop Oban, and he was going to set the Laughing hand out anyways with an easy path out, so the M9 gave them time. But I also feel like she is still going to be very mad anyway if they come clean cause I do not think they should…

i have No Idea how they’re gonna get out of this one cause like. i think they’re fucked whether they come clean or not. i might not be remembering right but weren’t they supposed to bring her people alive?? and now we have no clue what that blond fucker back in the Empire has to do with anything, or how Yasha  is attached. this was a colossal fuckup on their part. not sure what they could have done differently besides telling the bright queen they couldn’t handle it alone, but it’s just a bad situation all over

blog.description: Critical Role sideblog. Vox Machina spoilers are untagged, Mighty Nein spoilers are tagged until Tuesday. Main blog is warchiefsylvanas. I follow back on mindspanner. BravestNotts on twitter. Icon by jestevito.

tags: god there's gonna be some great angst and i am so excited for it
summary:
man, i just keep thinking about Yasha and just...
she's eventually getting out of the tomb, but what is the plan? does the...
body:
man, i just keep thinking about Yasha and just…

she’s eventually getting out of the tomb, but what is the plan? does the laughing hand have any sort of intelligence beyond violence? at this stage, does yasha? will there be a rash of killings in the barbed fields or are they going to find another tomb, another ancient servitor to unleash? will oban reform? his ashes had life to them…

if she’s eventually freed, or frees herself, from this state… will yasha even return to the mighty nein? or will she start running from that guilt, too? a statue of kord somehow broke her out of a similar state a few years ago, but will he intervene again?

and most importantly, when will ashley return from the war?

if she’s eventually freed, or frees herself, from this state… will yasha even return to the mighty nein? or will she start running from that guilt, too? a statue of kord somehow broke her out of a similar state a few years ago, but will he intervene again?

and most importantly, when will ashley return from the war?

blog.name: concept-stage
blog.description:
AO3 I'm open for fic prompts.
she/her, You can call me Denni,
I live blog Critical Role every week.
I tag spoilers as 'Critical Role spoilers' until the new episode comes out on youtube.

tags: feel free to tell me any ideas you have for this
summary: So, Yasha’s wings pop out when she gets startled and Caduceus turns invisible. I wonder if all the Nein have reactions like...
body:
So, Yasha’s wings pop out when she gets startled and Caduceus turns invisible. I wonder if all the Nein have reactions like that?

Nott: Squeals and instinctively reaches for her old mask, muttering about how she’s just a little halfling girl until she realizes it’s one of her friends.

Fjord: Jumps and silently summons his falchion, spinning around ready to fight and then rolling his eyes and sighing. “The fjuck you think you’re doing, sneaking up on a guy like that?”

Caleb: Summons a fire ball to his hand and keeps it around until his heart rate slows down, even after it’s become clear that he’s not in danger. He just feels better with the heat on his palm.

Molly: Does his damnedest to pretend that he wasn’t startled at all and just smiles serenely. “Ah, there you are. I was just looking for you,” he says, as if he was expecting you.

Beau: You can figure out exactly how startled she was by how many times she says ‘fuck’ in the ensuing lecture.

Jester: You can’t sneak up on a trickster and you should be ashamed for even trying. If you leave this encounter with only one dick drawn on you, consider yourself lucky.

summary: I saw a post earlier saying that maybe The Stormlord blocked all these memories from Yasha as a form of mercy and honestly I...
body: I saw a post earlier saying that maybe The Stormlord blocked all these memories from Yasha as a form of mercy and honestly I agree. Oban and the Angel of Irons seemed to have taken advantage of Yasha in her grief and anger and used her. She did awful things in that time, but none of it was truly her. The Stormlord saved her, and in doing so he purposely blocked off that section of her memory, while letting her keep everything from before… everything that was actually Yasha. Her childhood, Zuala, etc. I’m really sad about her and anxious about what comes next. I THINK she is under the influence of Geas, though I could be wrong. That typically lasts for 30 days unless it’s cast at a very high level. It can be removed by greater restoration, remove curse, or wish spell but the M9 would have to figure out that’s what’s at play. I’m just really hoping they’ll realize that Yasha wasn’t playing them, and be able to help her. Or at least she will snap out of it and make her way back to them and explain. The Laughing Hand is an immediate threat but I’m also worried about her having picked up the Oban goo that seemed to still be thrumming. God, this is all so crazy! Like I know Ashley has to leave but I didn’t expect this kind of turn in Yasha’s story! Please hurry back, Ash! And come on M9, y'all have got this!

That typically lasts for 30 days unless it’s cast at a very high level. Like I know Ashley has to leave but I didn’t expect this kind of turn in Yasha’s story! Please hurry back, Ash! And come on M9, y'all have got this!

Her childhood, Zuala, etc. I’m really sad about her and anxious about what comes next. I THINK she is under the influence of Geas, though I could be wrong. It can be removed by greater restoration, remove curse, or wish spell but the M9 would have to figure out that’s what’s at play. The Laughing Hand is an immediate threat but I’m also worried about her having picked up the Oban goo that seemed to still be thrumming. God, this is all so crazy! Like I know Ashley has to leave but I didn’t expect this kind of turn in Yasha’s story! Please hurry back, Ash! And come on M9, y'all have got this!
